      • confirmAvailableFunds

        private boolean confirmAvailableFunds(java.util.List<Effect> chosenEffects)
                               throws InvalidPlayerException,
                                      java.rmi.RemoteException
        Confirms that a player has enough buyables to pay for all of the chosen effects.
        Parameters:
        chosenEffects - the list of chosen effects
        Returns:
        true if the player can pay for the chosen effects, false otherwise
        Throws:
        InvalidPlayerException - if the selected player is invalid
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if a remote exception occurs

      • handleAnyTimeEffects

        private java.util.List<Effect> handleAnyTimeEffects(java.util.List<Effect> chosenEffects)
                                             throws InputCancelledException
        Handle anyTime effects by asking the user when to use them.
        Parameters:
        chosenEffects - the list of chosen effects
        Returns:
        a list of chosen effects with anyTime effects in the right position
        Throws:
        InputCancelledException - if the user input is cancelled

        Show weapon selection prompt for the user to select which weapon to swap.
        Parameters:
        ownWeapons - the list of user's weapons to show

      • showPowerUpSelection

        public void showPowerUpSelection(java.lang.String targetName,
                                 java.util.List<PowerUp> powerUps,
                                 boolean discard)
        Show power up selection prompt to the user.
        Parameters:
        powerUps - the list of power ups to show
        discard - true if the selection is going to discard the power up for a (re)spwan, false otherwise
